user_question: How can a consulting firm help a company transition to a 4-day workweek while maintaining productivity?
final_answer: A consulting firm can help a company transition to a 4-day workweek by conducting a thorough analysis of current workflows, identifying areas for efficiency improvements, providing training on time management, and implementing technology solutions to automate repetitive tasks. They can also facilitate workshops to align team goals and ensure clear communication strategies are in place.
